titleInfo.title: Performance and discussion - Salute to pedal steel guitarist Buddy Emmons - 2013-09-21

mods.abstract: Performances and discussion on the Big E; Salute to pedal steel guitarist Buddy Emmons from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 21, 2013. Presented in Partnership with the Americana Music Association in celebration of the album release The Big E: Salute to Steel Guitarist Buddy Emmons.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
